page.title: 19Moy Summary
page.content:
Moy lies on a quiet curve of the old A9. A quiet, scattered community edged by a main rail line and the fast new A9 roadway. It experiences the best of both worlds with peaceful surroundings lying so close to the busy centre of Inverness. There has been a considerable changeover in the population. People from different backgrounds integrate well within this lovely area. The changes with depopulation and now people moving into the area have been inevitable and are typical of many villages in the Highlands.
Rushing to the future we ought to consider more carefuly the present and the past, our people and our countryside.
PLEASE TAKE CARE OF OUR RURAL AREAS
